description: Want to add excitement to your next kinky dinner party? Nikki Nefarious how to use rope to tie men or women into a variety of useful positions for forniphilia (human furniture), including a living candelabra, a decadent champagne fountain, a walking ashtray or serving platter, a two-tiered serving dish, and even a sexy coffee table! This tutorial uses three 30' (10m) lengths of 1/4" (6mm) nylon or other synthetic rope.Note: This tutorial's many images include a set of photos with descriptive how-to captions!
title: Rope Bondage for Objectification - with Nikki Nefarious
